articles.title: Stranger Things' Robin Buckley 'doomed' as Netflix fans spot huge clues
articles.description: Stranger Things fans are convinced they know who will be the next character to get killed off in the Netflix hit's fifth and final season.
articles.content:
Stranger Things fans are convinced they know who will be the next character to get killed off in the Netflix hit's fifth and final season.
Stranger Things season five fans are eagerly awaiting part two but in the meantime, all eyes are on the future ... [3284 chars]

articles.title: Stranger Things & Diddy Doc Dominate Netflix In First Week Of December
articles.description: Stranger Things 5 was the most-streamed title of the week on Netflix, but Sean Combs: The Reckoning came in a close second
articles.content: Stranger Things was still dominating Netflix last week after a record-breaking opening over the Thanksgiving holiday. The first four episodes of Season 5, while down about 57% from its debut weekend, put up a massive 25.2M views from December 1 to 7,... [1721 chars]

articles.title: Who has the cast of Stranger Things dated?
articles.description: Not every Stranger Things relationship has been as public (or as publicly unravelling) as David Harbour and Lily Allens!
articles.content: Not every Stranger Things relationship has been as public (or as publicly unravelling) as David Harbour and Lily Allen, which had the whole world asking, ‘Who the f**k is Madeline?’ However, the other cast’s love lives have definitely kept fans watch... [6129 chars]

articles.title: The Reckoning' Ratings on Netflix
articles.description: 'Stranger Things' Season 5 led the Netflix Top 10 in its second week, followed by Diddy docuseries 'Sean Combs: The Reckoning.'
articles.content: It’s “Stranger Things” season at Netflix. Last week, the first four episodes of the sci-fi show’s fifth and final season debuted with 59.6 million views in their first five days of streaming last week. Though viewership decreased to 23.6 million view... [1500 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft Flight Sim 2024 now has a Stranger Things expansion
articles.description: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 just introduced an expansion inspired by the Netflix show Stranger Things. It lets people fly over Hawkins and complete missions.
articles.content:
Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 just got a fairly bizarre expansion inspired by the Netflix show Stranger Things. If you've ever wanted to fly over a fictional Indiana town in the 1980s, this is the update for you.
That's right. The game now lets fol... [465 chars]

articles.description: Stranger Things fans are convinced they know who will be killed in the next instalment of Season 5, thanks to a major clue released by Netflix
articles.content:
Stranger Things season 5 official Netflix trailer
Stranger Things enthusiasts are certain they've identified the next victim in season 5 following a significant "hint" dropped by Netflix.

articles.title: Explore Iconic Stranger Things Locations Thanks To New MFS Update
articles.description: Microsoft Flight Simulator has shown off some of the Stranger Things locations coming to the game, and they're all looking pretty fantastic.
articles.content: The surprising crossover betweenStranger Things and Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is now available, and a series of new images reveal major locations from the show that make it into the game. While Microsoft Flight Simulator represents the gold sta... [1950 chars]

articles.title: When the Phone Number in That TV Show Actually Connects Somewhere
articles.description: Passing on the classic 555 number, “Stranger Things” is the latest show to offer Easter eggs for viewers who try to call a fictional character.
articles.content: In the final season of the Netflix hit “Stranger Things,” which dropped last month, posters are put up around the fictional town of Hawkins, Ind., seeking the character Eleven (a.k.a. Jane Hopper, played by Millie Bobby Brown), along with a phone num... [1979 chars]
